content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --TPT
      operator: exists
    - name: --TPTNUM
      operator: not_exists
Core:
  Id: CORE-000026
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: When --TPT is present in a dataset, --TPTNUM must also be present.
Outcome:
  Message: The --TPTNUM variable does not exist when --TPT does exist.
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0468
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: When time points are represented in SDTMIG domains,
                  both --TPT and --TPTNUM must be used.
                Document: IG v3.3
                Section: 4.4.10 Timing Variables for All Classes
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: When --TPT is present in a dataset, --TPTNUM must also be present.

Outcome.Message: The --TPTNUM variable does not exist when --TPT does exist.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: When time points are represented in SDTMIG domains, both --TPT and --TPTNUM must be used.
